about.title: About Wiwekaitech
about.subtitle: Custom ERP & Enterprise Software Experts
about.description: We are a specialized software development company focused on building custom ERP systems, accounting platforms, and enterprise web applications. With over 10 years of experience, we understand the complexity of business systems and deliver solutions that scale.
about.missionText: To empower businesses with robust, scalable enterprise software that drives efficiency and growth.

about.value1Text: We never compromise on architecture and code quality.
about.value2Text: We leverage the latest technologies including AI to deliver faster.
about.value3Text: Your success is our success. We build solutions that truly work.

hero.title: Custom ERP Software Built for Your Business
hero.subtitle: End-to-end enterprise resource planning systems tailored to your unique workflows — not generic templates.

whatIs.title: What is ERP?
whatIs.description: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) is a centralized system that integrates critical business functions into a unified platform. It breaks down data silos and enables real-time visibility across your entire organization.
whatIs.feature1Desc: Single source of truth for all business information
whatIs.feature2Desc: Finance, inventory, HR, sales, and more in one system
whatIs.feature3Desc: Live dashboards and reporting across all departments
whatIs.feature4Desc: Eliminate manual workflows and reduce errors

whyNeed.title: Why Businesses Need ERP
whyNeed.description: Transform how your business operates with a unified system
whyNeed.reason1Desc: Connect all departments on a single platform
whyNeed.reason2Desc: Reduce redundant processes and manual tasks
whyNeed.reason4Desc: Real-time insights for better decision making

customized.title: Customized ERP Tailored to Your Workflow
customized.subtitle: Not all businesses are the same. Your ERP shouldn't be either.
customized.problemDesc: Generic ERP platforms force you to adapt your business to their rigid workflows. Configuration becomes a nightmare, and you end up with unused features and workarounds.
customized.advantage1Desc: We analyze your unique business processes before building anything
customized.advantage2Desc: Add modules and features as your business grows
customized.advantage3Desc: Seamlessly connects with your existing tools and systems
customized.advantage4Desc: Control who sees and does what at every level
customized.advantage5Desc: Built with maintainability and future expansion in mind
customized.advantage6Desc: We continuously enhance your system based on feedback

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us for Your ERP
whyChoose.subtitle: Partner with engineers who understand enterprise systems
whyChoose.feature1Desc: Clean architecture and best practices for maintainability
whyChoose.feature3Desc: Systems built to grow with your business
whyChoose.feature4Desc: 10+ years across manufacturing, retail, and distribution

useCases.title: ERP Solutions for Your Industry
useCases.subtitle: Pre-built modules and workflows for different business types
useCases.case1Desc: Production planning, inventory management, quality control, and supply chain optimization
useCases.case2Desc: Warehouse management, order fulfillment, logistics tracking, and supplier management
useCases.case3Desc: Point of sale, inventory sync, retail analytics, and customer management
useCases.case4Desc: General ledger, accounts payable/receivable, financial reporting, and compliance
useCases.case5Desc: Project management, resource allocation, service billing, and compliance tracking

hero.title: Modern Cooperative Financial System with Mobile App
hero.subtitle: End-to-end koperasi simpan pinjam software to manage savings, loans, member data, accounting, and reporting — accessible via web and mobile app.

whatIs.title: What is a Cooperative Financial System?
whatIs.description: Definition and core purpose of savings and loan cooperative software
whatIs.content1: A Cooperative Financial System (Koperasi Simpan Pinjam) is a centralized web-based platform that manages all aspects of savings and loan cooperatives. It brings together member data, savings accounts, loan management, installment tracking, and financial reporting into a single, unified system.
whatIs.content2: Our system is designed specifically for cooperatives, with built-in workflows for savings types, loan schemes, interest calculations, and profit-sharing (SHU) distributions. Unlike generic accounting software, our platform understands the unique business logic of cooperative operations.
whatIs.benefits_title: Key Benefits of Digital Cooperative Systems
whatIs.benefit1: Centralized member data and transaction history

whyNeed.title: Why Modern Cooperatives Need Digital Transformation
whyNeed.description: The business case for digital cooperative management
whyNeed.reason1_description: Manage member profiles, savings accounts, and loan history in a centralized system
whyNeed.reason2_description: Eliminate manual errors in savings, loan, and interest calculations
whyNeed.reason3_description: Monitor loan repayments, penalties, and payment schedules automatically
whyNeed.reason4_description: Generate comprehensive reports anytime for audits, compliance, and decision-making
whyNeed.reason5_description: Members can view their accounts online, increasing trust and engagement
whyNeed.reason6_description: Automated workflows minimize miscalculations and data inconsistencies

mobileApp.title: Cooperative System with Integrated Mobile App
mobileApp.description: The competitive advantage of mobile-first cooperative banking
mobileApp.explanation: Unlike traditional cooperative systems, we provide an integrated mobile app for members. This enables real-time self-service access to accounts, reducing inquiries and improving member satisfaction.
mobileApp.memberCapabilities_title: What Members Can Do on Mobile
mobileApp.feature2: View loan status and remaining balance

customize.title: Customized Cooperative Software Tailored to Your Workflow
customize.description: Every cooperative is unique — our system adapts to your business rules
customize.savings_desc: Support mandatory, voluntary, and special savings programs with custom rules
customize.loans_desc: Define loan types, maximum amounts, and eligibility criteria
customize.interest_desc: Customize interest rates, calculation methods, and adjustment rules
customize.penalties_desc: Set penalty policies for late payments and default conditions
customize.sharing_desc: Configure profit distribution ratios and allocation methods
customize.workflows_desc: Define multi-level approval processes for loans and transactions

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us as Your Technology Partner
whyChoose.description: Enterprise-grade cooperative management software built for reliability
whyChoose.webMobile_description: Seamless experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile platforms with synchronized data
whyChoose.security_description: Bank-level security with granular permission control for administrators, officers, and members
whyChoose.development_description: AI-assisted engineering accelerates time-to-market without sacrificing code quality
whyChoose.scalable_description: Grow from hundreds to thousands of members without performance degradation
whyChoose.codeQuality_description: Enterprise-grade codebase ensures long-term stability and easy enhancements
whyChoose.support_description: Dedicated support team for maintenance, bug fixes, and feature improvements

useCases.title: Who Is This System For?
useCases.description: Cooperative systems trusted by financial organizations across different sectors
useCases.ksp_description: The primary use case — designed specifically for traditional savings and loan cooperatives
useCases.creditUnions_description: Similar to cooperatives with member-owned structure and democratic governance
useCases.employees_description: Support employee-based savings and loan programs within organizations
useCases.community_description: Local finance organizations serving specific geographic or demographic communities
useCases.microfinance_description: Serve small-scale borrowers with loans and savings programs
useCases.islamic_description: Support Sharia-compliant financing and profit-sharing models
